    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion and contraction of solids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion und Kontraktion der Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion et contraction des solides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão e contração dos sólidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione e contrazione dei solidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση και συστολή των στερεών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión y contracción de sólidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how expansion and contraction of solids can be used to straighten up bent walls of buildings.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">contraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Expansion und 
Kontraktion der Körper verwendet werden können, um herauf verbogene 
Wände der Gebäude geradezurichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'expansion et 
la contraction des solides peuvent être employées pour se redresser 
vers le haut des murs coudés des bâtiments.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a expansão e a 
contração dos sólidos podem ser usadas endireitar acima das paredes
curvadas dos edifícios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'espansione e la
contrazione dei solidi possono essere usate per raddrizzare sulle 
pareti piegate delle costruzioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η επέκταση και η 
συστολή των στερεών μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για να ισιώσουν 
τους επάνω καμμμένους τοίχους των κτηρίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la extensión y 
la contracción de sólidos se pueden utilizar para enderezarse encima
de las paredes dobladas de edificios.</string>
          </description>
